Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located in the heart of Cumberland/Galleria, Galleria 400 stands 19 stories tall and is within a short walking distance of Truist Park, home of the Atlanta Braves. Tenants of Galleria 400 can take a quick stroll across the office parkâ€™s pedestrian bridge to The Battery Atlanta for lunch, shopping, or to enjoy a baseball game after work.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SUBLEASE: 400 Galleria Pky SE | Atlanta, GA
